title: Spendy - Your Money, At A Glance.
description: A dashboard application that helps you keep track of your expenses and income. It also provides insights and analytics, such as spending trends, categories, recurring expenses, and more.

title: Rhombichess
description: Experience the thrill of RhombiChess, where traditional strategy meets innovative gameplay! A fresh twist on classic chess, featuring a challenging rhombus-shaped board and exciting new pieces!
